channel.description: Recent content in bubblesort on Code Repository

item.title: Bubble Sort
item.description: Bubble Sort public class Solution { public static void bubblesort(int[] array) { boolean isSorted = false; int lastUnsorted = array.length - 1; while (!isSorted) { isSorted = true; for(int i = 0; i < lastUnsorted; i++) { if(array[i] > array[i+1]) { int tmp = array[i]; array[i] = array[i+1]; array[i+1] = tmp; lastSorted = false; } } lastUnsorted--; } } }
